typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		CountryRegion as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'CustomerData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> CustomerDataDeltaSource
CustomerDataDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(CustomerId),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Customer = last(Customer)) ~> Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource
SurrogateKey select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId,
		Customer,
		CustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCustomerData
Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource keyGenerate(output(CustomerKey as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SelectCustomerData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Customer',
	recreate:true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> IndividualCustomerSink
